data.title: Krk climate: Average Temperature by month, Krk water temperature
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Krk

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Krk

>>average temperature by month Krk

>>Weather Krk

>>Water temperature Krk

The climate here is considered warm and temperate. There is significant rainfall throughout the year in Krk. Even the driest month still has a lot of rainfall. The Köppen-Geiger climate classification is Cfa. The average temperature in Krk is 13.8 °C | 56.8 °F. The precipitation level on a yearly basis amounts to 1557 mm | 61.3 inch as per the meteorological records.

Krk are in the northern hemisphere. Summer starts here at the end of June and ends in September. There are the months of summer: June, July, August, September. The best time to visit is July, August.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Krk

In July, the precipitation level plummets to a mere 55 mm | 2.2 inch. This month holds the title for being exceptionally arid. Most precipitation falls in November, with an average of 243 mm | 9.6 inch.

average temperature by month Krk

The month of highest temperature is July during which the average temperature reaches up to 23.8 °C | 74.9 °F. In January, the average temperature is 4.5 °C | 40.1 °F. It is the lowest average temperature of the whole year.

Weather by month // weather averages Krk

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The precipitation variance between the months with the lowest and highest levels of rainfall is 188 mm | 7 inch. The average temperatures vary during the year by 19.3 °C | 34.7 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is November (77.37 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is July (60.74 %). The month with the highest number of rainy days is November (14.83 days). The month with the lowest number of rainy days is July (5.47 days).

Krk weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Krk

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In Krk, the month with the most daily hours of sunshine is July with an average of 13.06 hours of sunshine. In total there are 404.86 hours of sunshine throughout July.

The month with the fewest daily hours of sunshine in Krk is January with an average of 5.12 hours of sunshine a day. In total there are 158.84 hours of sunshine in January.

Around 3275.45 hours of sunshine are counted in Krk throughout the year. On average there are 107.53 hours of sunshine per month.

Airport close to Krk

The closest Airports of Krk are: Rijeka Airport (RJK) 21.08km,Lošinj Airport (LSZ) 53.24km,Pula Airport (PUY) 53.47km

You can reach Krk from this Cities by Plane: London (STN), Hamburg (HAM), Cologne (CGN), Oslo (RYG), Stockholm (ARN), Frankfurt am Main (FRA), Manchester (MAN), Dublin (DUB), Zagreb (ZAG), Dubrovnik (DBV), Brussels (CRL), Stuttgart (STR), Hahn (HHN), Zadar (ZAD)
